title: Barcelona - Real Madrid - where to watch - what channel - 28 10 2023 - how to watch in Ukraine
body_text:
News
Where to watch Barcelona vs Real Madrid: El Clasico broadcast schedule
Catalan club Barcelona will play with Real Madrid in the central match of the 11th round of the Spanish football championship. The meeting will take place at the Olympic Stadium in Sant Montjuic on Saturday, October 28.
OBOZ.UA will provide an online broadcast of the Barcelona vs Real Madrid match. The match starts at 17:15 Kyiv time.
Ukrainian football fans will be able to watch the first El Clasico of the season thanks to the broadcast on the Megogo video platform and its Megogo Football 1 channel. It is also available on Volia TV.
After ten matches played, the teams share only one point in the La Liga standings. Madrid is tied with Girona for first place with 25 points, and the Catalans are next.
Another representative of the capital, Atletico Madrid, has 22 points and a game in hand. At the same time, Bar√ßa remains the only team in the league that has not yet suffered a single defeat.
It should be noted that Real Madrid and Barcelona have played 253 matches in their history: 102 matches were won by the former and 99 remained for the latter. 183 matches took place in the Spanish championship. Madrid won 77 times and the Catalans won 74 times.
As reported by OBOZ.UA, the day before, Catalan Barcelona beat Shakhtar Donetsk in the third round of the Champions League group stage with a small gap.
Only verified information is available on OBOZ.UA Telegram and Viber. Do not fall for fakes!
